rules_text:
Golden age [i](If you cast an instant or sorcery spell, activated a nonmana ability, and attacked this turn, enter a renaissance for this game.)[/i]
{2}{G}: Put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control. If you’re in a renaissance, you may have that land become a 0/0 green Elemental creature until end of turn. [i](It’s still a land.)[/i]
